Articles.Content:
Is there any difference in 1.0.2 stock aero between normal wing, swept wing or reverse swept wing (except CoL/CoM considerations) ?

Edited June 10, 2015 by Warzouz
Wings in ksp are universal. Only difference is the lift rate different wings have

There is some difference in reentry heating for a spaceplane. Leading edges outside the cone formed by the nose heat up more than those more closely tucked in. Aside from that, shape is largely irrelevant to lift/drag concerns.

Squad didnt implement aspect ratio realistically. When youre going slow, your wings act like a thin rectangular wing, and when youre Going Really Fast they act like swept wings.

I recommend FAR.
